h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice
content: To defeat him, stay patient by building up focus points with sustained damage on his leg, using your Spirit Attacks too to rack up damage so that it can stagger the boss, then unleash more combos before your biggest charged up strike to maximize damage to his weak point before he rises. Use Cloud Step to get away from some of his more pesky lighting strikes and beams, and use Immobilize to stop Lotus-Vision's wild melee stomps and attacks (it generally doesn't work to help extend his stunned state).

The content is as follows:
To defeat him, stay patient by building up focus points with sustained damage on his leg, using your Spirit Attacks too to rack up damage so that it can stagger the boss, then unleash more combos before your biggest charged up strike to maximize damage to his weak point before he rises. Use Cloud Step to get away from some of his more pesky lighting strikes and beams, and use Immobilize to stop Lotus-Vision's wild melee stomps and attacks (it generally doesn't work to help extend his stunned state).
